Description: Finger-ring; meerschaum; hoop of triangular section with projection at back; pointed oval bezel.
Curator's comments: Parallel: D. J. Content, "Rings", in: id. (ed.) Islamic Rings and Gems: The Benjamin Zucker Collection (London 1987) cat. 67; cf. H. Battke, Geschichte des Ringes in Beschreibung und Bildern (Baden-Baden 1953) cat. 148.
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Rev Greville John Chester
